nodes.text: Slikartha was a male doctor who worked for the New Republic. After the death of ex-Vice Admiral Perwin Gedde aboard the Halo, the Halo landed on Chandrila and Wedge Antilles told them that they should call down for droids to take Gedde's body to Doctor Slikartha, who would inspect the corpse. Before this could happen, one of the crewmembers, Jas Emari, discovered that the cause of death was poison by kytrogorgia. Antilles then said that he would go tell Slikartha.
